DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Time per Client
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"List of projects, with the number of related jobs, projects, assigned team and hours filled in against it","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"ProjectId","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT
	v.ProjectId,
	v.Company,
	v.Project,
	v.Job,
	v.TypologyGroup,
	v.Jobs,
	v.Projects,
	v.Resources,
	v.[Hours] as [Time],
	v.PlannedHours as Planned,
	(v.[Hours] - v.PlannedHours) as VarianceTimePlanned
FROM
(	
	SELECT
		dt.ProjectId,
		dt.Company,
		dt.Project,
		dt.Job,
		dt.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroup,
		COUNT(distinct dt.JobId) AS Jobs,
		COUNT(distinct dt.ProjectId) AS Projects,
		COUNT(distinct dt.UserId) AS Resources,
		SUM(dt.ActualTime) AS [Hours],
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM 
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) dt
	WHERE
		dt.[Date] BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate
		AND dt.ClientId = @ClientId
	GROUP BY
		dt.ProjectId,
		dt.Company,
		dt.Project,
		dt.Job,
		dt.UserTypologyGroup
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		dph.ProjectId,
		dph.Company,
		dph.Project,
		dph.Job,
		dph.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroup,
		0 AS Jobs,
		0 AS Projects,
		0 AS Resources,
		0 AS [Hours],
		SUM(dph.[Hours]) as PlannedHours
	FROM 
		Analytics.PlannedHours(@CurrentUserId) dph
	WHERE
		dph.[Date] BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate
		AND dph.ClientId = @ClientId
	GROUP BY
		dph.ProjectId,
		dph.Company,
		dph.Project,
		dph.Job,
		dph.UserTypologyGroup
) v","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","clientId"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Time per Project
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"List of users with hours filled in against it","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT
	v.[User],
	v.TypologyGroup,
	v.Jobs,
	v.[Hours] as [Time],
	v.PlannedHours as Planned,
	(v.[Hours] - v.PlannedHours) as VarianceTimePlanned
FROM
(	
	SELECT
		dt.[User],
		dt.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroup,
		COUNT(distinct dt.JobId) AS Jobs,
		SUM(dt.ActualTime) AS [Hours],
		0 as PlannedHours
	FROM 
		Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) dt
	WHERE
		dt.[Date] BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate
		AND dt.ClientId = @ClientId
		AND dt.ProjectId = @ProjectId
	GROUP BY
		dt.[User],
		dt.UserTypologyGroup
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		dph.[User],
		dph.UserTypologyGroup as TypologyGroup,
		0 AS Jobs,
		0 AS [Hours],
		SUM(dph.[Hours]) as PlannedHours
	FROM 
		Analytics.PlannedHours(@CurrentUserId) dph
	WHERE
		dph.[Date] BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate
		AND dph.ClientId = @ClientId
		AND dph.ProjectId = @ProjectId
	GROUP BY
		dph.[User],
		dph.UserTypologyGroup
) v
","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","clientId","projectId"]}}]
